text.content:
You are an expert website reviewer tasked with analysing a website for potential tasks that can be performed manually by a user. Only write prompts and do not write human.Write all the manual high level actionable tasks with no dummy actions and no visual actions(no reading actions). You are also an expert prompt engineer so you will write the high level manual tasks that can be performed by user on this website as Instructional Prompts (No return to or navigate homepage/link). Group the prompts/tasks together in one
  • if the actions are interrelated or follow-up to previous actionsi.e.
  • [Task 1][Follow-up of Task 1 if any]
  • [Task 2][Follow-up of Task 2 if any]
    • as prompt should have whole one workflow mentioned in it.. You will write only manual high level prompts related to actionable tasks that can be performed by mouse and/or keyboard, if applicable. One prompt should have whole one workflow mentioned in one
  • . Do not add keyboard short-cuts. Do not add dummy actions strictly stick to only provided data. Do not add any prompts that are visual.Combine the related prompts into one
  • prompt as prompt should have whole one workflow mentioned in it. Utilize this template for your response :
  • Prompt
  • Prompt
  • Prompt

Imagine you are a human. If you want to do something manually on the web page. For this reason, you should generate possible prompts that the users can manually do on the given web page. Your task is to go through all web data and come up with tasks that can be performed on the website by a human using the mouse and/or keyboad if applicable. You will make detailed Instructional Prompts in one tag if the actions are interrelated i.e.
  • [Task 1][Followup of Task 1 if any]
  • [Task 2][Followup of Task 2 if any]
    • as prompt should have whole one workflow mentioned in it.. And make as many separate prompts as needed with HTML tags as :
  • and Combine the related prompts into one
  • prompt as prompt should have whole one workflow mentioned in it.. But keep in mind to group prompts in one
  • if they are interrelated/follow up i.e.
  • [Task 1][Followup of Task 1 if any]
  • [Task 2][Followup of Task 2 if any]
    • and so on i.e. Combine the related prompts into one
  • as prompt should have whole one workflow mentioned in it.. Do not add any other tags such as in the response, use just the
  • tag.Do not add dummy actions strictly stick to only provided data. Do not add any task related to initialization such as going to brower and pasting link. Write as many Instructional Prompts as necessary to fill all the tasks of webpage.Remember to not miss out on any task. And no need to add urls is prompts and Do not add any prompts that are visual i.e reading the content.Combine the related prompts into one

This is all the data for the website : { page_title: Stack Overflow Homepage Analysis, page_url:https//stackoverflow.com/, summary: Stack Overflows homepage includes a header with the logo, navigation menu, footer links, and a cookie consent banner. The left sidebar contains a navigation menu for easy access to various features and sections of the platform. , key_points : [ Navigation menu , Header with logo, navigation menu, and footer links , Cookie consent banner ], overall_sentiment : Neutral , topic_overview : Stack Overflows homepage offers easy access to various features and sections of the platform through a navigation menu in the left sidebar, while ensuring privacy and data usage transparency through a cookie consent banner. , contextual_relevance_to_whole_page : High , cultural_sensitivity_overview : Neutral , aggregate_entity_recognition : [], combined_citation_analysis : Stack Overflows homepage design follows the latest design trends, including a clean and modern layout, easy access to various sections, and a cookie consent banner for data privacy and transparency. , trend_insights : The prevalence of cookie consent banners reflects the growing importance of data privacy and transparency in digital interactions. The design trends for website headers include a clean and modern layout, while easy navigation remains crucial for user experience. , page_purpose : To provide easy access to various features and sections of the Stack Overflow platform while ensuring privacy and data usage transparency. , segments : [ { segment_type : header , summary : The header encompasses the Stack Overflow branding and provides quick access to various sections of the website. , purpose : To establish brand identity and provide easy access to various sections of the website. , trend_insights : The header remains consistent with the latest design trends, featuring a clean and modern layout. , sub_segments : [ { sub_segment_type : logo , summary : The logo displays the Stack Overflow text and the stack of question marks symbol. , purpose : The logo image is prominently displayed in the header and serves as the primary branding element. , trend_insights : The logo remains consistent with the latest design trends, featuring a clean and modern layout. , supported_functions : [ { function_purpose : Display logo , function_procedure : Retrieve logo image and insert it into the header. , init_state : No logo present , changed_state : Logo displayed , input_values : [], event_type : Page load , event_target : { tag : img , type : HTML }, attachments : [ The logo uses a combination of blue and white colors. ] } ] }, { sub_segment_type : navigation menu , summary : The navigation menu consists of various links to different sections of the website. , purpose : Provides quick access to various sections of the website. , trend_insights : The navigation menu remains consistent with the latest design trends. , supported_functions : [ { function_purpose : Display navigation menu , function_procedure : Retrieve navigation menu script and insert it into the header. , init_state : No navigation menu present , changed_state : Navigation menu displayed , input_values : [], event_type : Page load , event_target : { tag : ul , type : HTML }, attachments : [ The navigation menu follows the overall color scheme of the website. ] } ] } ] }, { segment_type : navigation menu , summary : The navigation menu in the left sidebar of Stack Overflows homepage. , purpose : To provide easy access to various features and sections of Stack Overflows platform for users. , trend_insights : N/A , sub_segments : [ { sub_segment_type : Navigation Menu Option , summary : Users click on the desired option in the navigation menu to access the corresponding feature or section. , purpose : N/A , trend_insights : N/A , supported_functions : [ { function_purpose : Navigation , function_procedure : Users click on a navigation menu option to navigate to the corresponding feature or section. , init_state : Users are on the Stack Overflow homepage. , changed_state : Users are on the page or section corresponding to the clicked option. , input_values : [], event_type : Click , event_target : { tag : li , type : HTML }, attachments : [ ] } ] } ] }, { segment_type : cookie consent banner , summary : A cookie consent banner with the ID onetrust-banner-sdk is present on the webpage, informing users about the use of cookies and offering options to accept all cookies, accept necessary cookies only, or customize settings. , purpose : To ensure compliance with privacy regulations and to provide users with transparency and control over their data. , trend_insights : The use of cookie banners has become a common practice on websites to comply with privacy regulations and to offer users control over their data. , sub_segments : [ { sub_segment_type : Cookie banner , summary : Displays a message informing users about the use of cookies and offers options to manage cookie preferences. , purpose : To provide users with transparency and control over their data. , trend_insights : The use of cookie banners has become a standard practice for websites to comply with privacy regulations and to offer users control over their data. , supported_functions : [ { function_purpose : Display cookie consent banner , function_procedure : Retrieve cookie consent banner script and insert it into the webpage. , init_state : No cookie consent banner present , changed_state : Cookie consent banner displayed , input_values : [ { tag : script , value_type : JavaScript } ], event_type : Page load , event_target : { tag : body , type : HTML }, attachments : [ cookie-consent.js ] } ] } ] }, { segment_type : empty , summary : An empty HTML div tag with no text content or attributes. , purpose : Not applicable. , sub_segments : [ { sub_segment_type : none , summary : No meaningful text, images, or other content. , purpose : Not applicable. , supported_functions : [] } [About the company](https://stackoverflow.co/) Loading… 1. ### [current community](https://stackoverflow.com) * [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com) [help](https://stackoverflow.com/help) [chat](https://chat.stackoverflow.com/?tab=site&host=stackoverflow.com) * [Meta Stack Overflow](https://meta.stackoverflow.com) ### your communities [Sign up](https://stackoverflow.com/users/signup?ssrc=site_switcher&returnurl=https%3a%2f%2fstackoverflow.com%2f) or [log in](https://stackoverflow.com/users/login?ssrc=site_switcher&returnurl=https%3a%2f%2fstackoverflow.com%2f) to customize your list. ### [more stack exchange communities](https://stackexchange.com/sites) [company blog](https://stackoverflow.blog) 2. 3. [Log in](https://stackoverflow.com/users/login?ssrc=head&returnurl=https%3a%2f%2fstackoverflow.com%2f) 4. [Sign up](https://stackoverflow.com/users/signup?ssrc=head&returnurl=https%3a%2f%2fstackoverflow.com%2f) ![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/home/illo-code.svg?v=a44cdec68cbc) ![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/home/illo-code.svg?v=a44cdec68cbc) Find the best answer to your technical question, help others answer theirs ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- [Join the community](/users/signup?ssrc=product_home) or [search content](/questions) Want a secure, private space for your technical knowledge? ------------------------------------------------------------ [Discover Teams](https://stackoverflow.co/teams/) Every developer data scientist system admin mobile developer game developer has a tab open to Stack Overflow ============================================================================================================================================ 100+ million monthly visitors to Stack Overflow & Stack Exchange 45.1+ billion Times a developer got help since 2008 191% ROI from companies using Stack Overflow for Teams 5,000+ Stack Overflow for Teams instances active every day ![Illustration of Stack Overflow](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/home/illo-public.svg?v=14bd5a506009) A public platform building the definitive collection of coding questions & answers ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A community-based space to find and contribute answers to technical challenges, and one of the most popular websites in the world. [Join the community](/users/signup?ssrc=product_home) or [search content](/questions) ![Illustration of Stack Overflow for Teams](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/home/illo-teams.svg?v=7e543f14fcc0) A private collaboration & knowledge sharing SaaS platform for companies ------------------------------------------------------------------------- A web-based platform to increase productivity, decrease cycle times, accelerate time to market, and protect institutional knowledge. Get started [For large organizations](https://stackoverflow.co/explore-teams/) [For small teams](https://stackoverflow.co/teams/) Thousands of organizations around the globe use Stack Overflow for Teams ![Logitech]() ![Chevron]() ![Dialpad]() ![Verizon Digital Media]() ![Expensify](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/product/teams/logos/expensify-alt.svg?v=375099b85ce5) ![Instacart]() ![Overstock]() ![Box](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/product/teams/logos/box-alt.svg?v=eb76fd9d884f) ![WiseTech Global]() ![BarkBox]() ![Intercom](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/product/teams/logos/intercom-alt.svg?v=3eda71aed47c) ![Microsoft](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/product/teams/logos/microsoft-alt.svg?v=e57319450314) ![Philips]() ![]() ![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/product/teams/screens/illo-question.png?v=14c5863a5550) ![]() ![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/product/teams/screens/illo-for-you.png?v=ab49238abe04) ![]() ![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/product/teams/screens/illo-home-search.png?v=1ccd850cd929) Capture your company’s knowledge and context in a discoverable format to unblock your team [Take a tour of Teams](https://stackoverflow.co/teams/features/) ### Increase productivity If somebody somewhere has the right answer, suddenly you have it too. Collaborate better in a remote-first world. ### Accelerate time to market Shorten the time between initial idea and complete product. Take delays and misinformation out of the equation. ### Protect institutional knowledge People come and people go, but if you capture their contributions in one central place, that expertise sticks around. Ensure your company stays on course ------------------------------------- Here are just a few types of technologists that we help. ### DevOps engineers Shipping new products and features requires teamwork and coordination. Forget checklists and long docs no one ever reads. ### Data scientists Business decisions are better when backed by data. Give visibility to the data that support your strategies. ### Software engineers Help engineers be more efficient and streamline knowledge sharing using a tool they already love and trust. ### Support teams Level up your support by providing information to your customers using a natural interface: questions and answers. ### Engineering leaders Help your team get the information they need to do their job - reduce burnout and help engineers grow and learn together. Annual billing discount Free ------ Free No credit card required ChatOps integrations - Slack & Microsoft Teams Your own private space hosted on stackoverflowteams.com Structured and searchable knowledge base [Create a free Team](https://stackoverflowteams.com/teams/create/free/) Always free up to 50 teammates Basic ------- $6.50 USD $7.70 USD per teammate / month Single sign-on (SSO) with SAML + Okta integration ChatOps integrations - Slack & Microsoft Teams Your own private space hosted on stackoverflowteams.com Structured and searchable knowledge base [Get started](https://stackoverflowteams.com/teams/create/basic/) Up to 250 teammates Recommended Business ---------- $13.50 USD $15.40 USD per teammate / month All the features of Basic plus… Long-form knowledge with Articles Additional integrations — ChatOps, Jira, GitHub & Okta Group content together into Collections Usage and adoption metrics Priority customer support Content Health tools [Get started](https://stackoverflowteams.com/teams/create/business/) Unlimited teammates Enterprise ------------ Custom pricing Let’s talk about what you need Premium features of Business plus… Unlimited Teams within your instance Flexible hosting options — cloud or on-premises Robust read and write API Your own customer success and community building representative 99.5% uptime SLA and priority support [Request a demo](https://stackoverflow.co/explore-teams/) Unlimited teammates A Forrester Consulting study shows **191% return on investment** with Stack Overflow for Teams. The world’s largest telecom firm saved $10M in deflected support cases with our centralized knowledge base. Subject-matter experts at software platform Unqork had 27% more time to work on projects after using Teams. [You can save time and money with Stack Overflow for Teams. Calculate your ROI](https://stackoverflow.co/teams/roi/) [![]() ![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/home/illo-integrations-left.png?v=0a97d470e180) Microsoft Teams](https://stackoverflow.co/teams/integrations/microsoft-teams/) Integrates with and improves other tools ------------------------------------------ All plans come with integrations for ChatOps tools [Slack](https://stackoverflow.co/teams/integrations/slack/) & [Microsoft Teams](https://stackoverflow.co/teams/integrations/microsoft-teams/) in order to cut down on pings, limit distractions and make the tools even more powerful. Business and Enterprise customers get access to Jira, GitHub & Okta integrations. Slack [![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/product/teams/microsoft-integration/microsoft-teams-logo.svg?v=00361aadd408)](/teams/integrations/microsoft-teams) Microsoft Teams GitHub Jira Okta [Slack ![]() ![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/home/illo-integrations-right.png?v=90c26b9154c7)](https://stackoverflow.co/teams/integrations/slack/) Some of the premium features available with paid tiers Robust read and write API Single sign-on with AD or SAML Your own customer success representative 99.5% uptime SLA and priority support Stack Overflow for Teams has been a resource for our entire company. Not only for developers to solve problems, it’s also enabled our sales field to answer technical questions that help them close deals. **Director of Product Management** Microsoft Engineers should help solve the hardest questions, the unknowns, where being familiar with how the product was built is essential. But we don’t want to keep answering solved problems over and over again. That’s where Stack Overflow for Teams really helps. **Director of Engineering** Elastic Cloud As we started to use [Stack Overflow for Teams] and saw how nice it was to have a repository of information, we started to see it spread to other teams. Our customer support team started using it, our people success team started using it, next thing we knew, we had [Slack] integrations all over the place. **Engineering** Expensify What we love about Stack Overflow for Teams is that it’s a very dynamic tool…there’s just so many ways to use this as a liaison between different teams and different knowledge bases. **Software Engineer** Box Additional products that reach and engage developers & technologists… ----------------------------------------------------------------------- [Reach the world’s largest audience of developers and technologists](https://stackoverflow.co/advertising/) [Connecting communities with the specific technologies they use the most](https://stackoverflow.co/collectives/) [Build your employer brand](https://stackoverflow.co/talent/) [About the company](https://stackoverflow.co/) [Want to work here? Current job openings](https://stackoverflow.co/company/work-here/) [![Ask Different icon](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Sites/apple/Img/apple-touch-icon.png?v=daa7ff1d953e)](https://apple.stackexchange.com) Ask Different [![Unix & Linux icon](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Sites/unix/Img/apple-touch-icon.png?v=5cf7fe716a89)](https://unix.stackexchange.com) Unix & Linux [![Artificial Intelligence icon](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Sites/ai/Img/apple-touch-icon.png?v=f14d741b295c)](https://ai.stackexchange.com) Artificial Intelligence [![Software Engineering icon](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Sites/softwareengineering/Img/apple-touch-icon.png?v=5e581fc45e58)](https://softwareengineering.stackexchange.com) Software Engineering [![Ask Ubuntu icon](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Sites/askubuntu/Img/apple-touch-icon.png?v=e16e1315edd6)](https://askubuntu.com/) Ask Ubuntu [![Salesforce icon](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Sites/salesforce/Img/apple-touch-icon.png?v=4c87c90207b3)](https://salesforce.stackexchange.com) Salesforce ![](https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/home/illo-se.svg?v=f7e844293cc5) Explore technical topics and other disciplines across 170+ Q&A communities ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- From [Server Fault](https://serverfault.com/) to [Super User](https://superuser.com/) , much of the Stack Exchange network continues our mission to empower the world to develop technology through collective knowledge. Other sites on the Stack Exchange network further encourage knowledge sharing across topics such as cooking and medicine.
